5169.verse: وَإِذْ|And when|85|92|308$قَالَ|said|52|66|309$عِيسَى|Isa,|81|95|831$ٱبْنُ|son|52|66|2865$مَرْيَمَ|(of) Maryam,|106|120|833$يَـٰبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٲٓءِيلَ|`O Children of Israel!|163|177|11546$إِنِّى|Indeed, I am|104|111|312$رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ|(the) Messenger of Allah|183|195|4668$إِلَيْكُم|to you,|68|91|2453$مُّصَدِّقًا|confirming|87|110|425$لِّمَا|that which|91|114|426$بَيْنَ يَدَىَّ|(was) before me|129|152|2896$مِنَ|of|50|62|156$ٱلتَّوْرَٮٰةِ|the Taurat|92|109|2897$وَمُبَشِّرَۢا|and bringing glad tidings|180|214|16896$بِرَسُولٍ|(of) a Messenger|133|167|16897$يَأْتِى|to come|74|108|2311$مِنۢ بَعْدِى|after me,|111|128|1217$ٱسْمُهُۥٓ|whose name (will be)|160|177|1065$أَحْمَدُ‌ۖ|Ahmad.`|77|111|16898$فَلَمَّا|But when|82|116|141$جَآءَهُم|he came to them|133|167|853$بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ|with clear proofs,|136|153|880$قَالُواْ|they said,|86|149|101$هَـٰذَا|`This|59|184|248$سِحْرٌ|(is) a magic|98|223|8376$مُّبِينٌ|clear.`|66|129|1467$

5171.verse: يُرِيدُونَ|They intend|99|114|4112$لِيُطْفِــُٔواْ|to put out|90|120|16900$نُورَ|(the) light|87|117|16901$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|111|606$بِأَفْوَٲهِهِمْ|with their mouths,|141|171|3487$وَٱللَّهُ|but Allah|78|93|167$مُتِمُّ|will perfect|93|124|16902$نُورِهِۦ|His Light|79|141|12548$وَلَوْ|although|77|139|179$كَرِهَ|dislike|59|121|7154$ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ|the disbelievers.|128|159|4590$

5172.verse: هُوَ|He|48|59|298$ٱلَّذِىٓ|(is) the One Who|134|155|138$أَرْسَلَ|sent|76|97|7539$رَسُولَهُۥ|His Messenger|114|135|7540$بِٱلْهُدَىٰ|with guidance|112|133|131$وَدِينِ|and (the) religion|134|145|7541$ٱلْحَقِّ|(of) the truth,|115|130|613$لِيُظْهِرَهُۥ|to make it prevail|135|164|7542$عَلَى|over|63|92|52$ٱلدِّينِ|the religion|93|122|11$كُلِّهِۦ|all of them,|95|124|3209$وَلَوْ|although|77|92|179$كَرِهَ|dislike (it)|85|323|7154$ٱلْمُشْرِكُونَ|the polytheists.|124|362|7511$

5173.verse: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ|O you who believe!|197|203|7177$هَلْ|Shall|51|63|1829$أَدُلُّكُمْ|I guide you|94|106|11428$عَلَىٰ|to|63|75|52$تِجَـٰرَةٍ|a transaction|108|120|16903$تُنجِيكُم|(that) will save you|150|156|16904$مِّنْ|from|50|162|53$عَذَابٍ|a punishment|108|332|7871$أَلِيمٍ|painful?|70|182|2718$

5174.verse: تُؤْمِنُونَ|Believe|94|101|4108$بِٱللَّهِ|in Allah|67|81|79$وَرَسُولِهِۦ|and His Messenger|143|157|2497$وَتُجَـٰهِدُونَ|and strive|121|135|16905$فِى|in|48|62|89$سَبِيلِ|(the) way|86|100|1358$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|88|2$بِأَمْوَٲلِكُمْ|with your wealth|131|143|3887$وَأَنفُسِكُمْ‌ۚ|and your lives.|117|142|3588$ذَٲلِكُمْ|That|69|94|488$خَيْرٌ|(is) better|88|113|520$لَّكُمْ|for you|67|92|207$إِن|if|44|69|225$كُنتُمْ|you|60|72|214$تَعْلَمُونَ|know.|92|92|212$

5175.verse: يَغْفِرْ|He will forgive|112|122|15737$لَكُمْ|for you|67|86|207$ذُنُوبَكُمْ|your sins|85|104|2774$وَيُدْخِلْكُمْ|and admit you|114|133|16906$جَنَّـٰتٍ|(in) Gardens|101|120|241$تَجْرِى|flow|81|100|242$مِن|from|50|60|53$تَحْتِهَا|underneath it|109|119|243$ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ|the rivers|83|103|244$وَمَسَـٰكِنَ|and dwellings|108|128|7745$طَيِّبَةً|pleasant|76|96|2819$فِى|in|48|68|89$جَنَّـٰتِ|Gardens|75|95|5122$عَدْنٍ‌ۚ|(of) Eternity.|107|117|7746$ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|163|28$ٱلْفَوْزُ|(is) the success|127|326|3793$ٱلْعَظِيمُ|the great.|87|186|2284$

5176.verse: وَأُخْرَىٰ|And another|101|113|2660$تُحِبُّونَهَا‌ۖ|that you love -|121|145|16907$نَصْرٌ|a help|71|95|13579$مِّنَ|from|50|74|156$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|77|606$وَفَتْحٌ|and a victory|108|132|16908$قَرِيبٌ‌ۗ|near;|76|88|1614$وَبَشِّرِ|and give glad tidings|156|345|237$ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|(to) the believers.|141|330|1964$

5177.verse: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ|O you who believe!|197|205|7177$كُونُوٓاْ|Be|76|93|645$أَنصَارَ|helpers|85|102|16909$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|98|606$كَمَا|as|53|70|110$قَالَ|said|52|69|309$عِيسَى|Isa,|81|89|831$ٱبْنُ|son|52|58|2865$مَرْيَمَ|(of) Maryam,|106|118|833$لِلْحَوَارِيِّــۧنَ|to the disciples,|126|138|16910$مَنْ|`Who|57|69|76$أَنصَارِىٓ|(are) my helpers|129|141|2907$إِلَى|for|53|65|118$ٱللَّهِ‌ۖ|Allah?`|66|78|606$قَالَ|Said|52|58|309$ٱلْحَوَارِيُّونَ|the disciples,|127|133|2908$نَحْنُ|`We|62|74|103$أَنصَارُ|(are) the helpers|132|144|2909$ٱللَّهِ‌ۖ|(of) Allah.`|94|106|606$فَـَٔـامَنَت|Then believed|112|124|16911$طَّآئِفَةٌ|a group|74|86|2992$مِّنۢ|of|50|56|53$بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٲٓءِيلَ|Children of Israel|148|156|10567$وَكَفَرَت|and disbelieved|121|136|16912$طَّآئِفَةٌ‌ۖ|a group.|75|90|2992$فَأَيَّدْنَا|So We supported|134|149|16913$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|104|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believed|82|90|84$عَلَىٰ|against|68|114|52$عَدُوِّهِمْ|their enemy|98|189|16914$فَأَصْبَحُواْ|and they became|135|226|5056$ظَـٰهِرِينَ|dominant.|100|146|15136$

5169.verse: And [mention] when Jesus, the son of Mary, said, "O children of Israel, indeed I am the messenger of Allah to you confirming what came before me of the Torah and bringing good tidings of a messenger to come after me, whose name is Ahmad." But when he came to them with clear evidences, they said, "This is obvious magic."

5170.verse: And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah untruth while he is being invited to Islam. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

5171.verse: They want to extinguish the light of Allah with their mouths, but Allah will perfect His light, although the disbelievers dislike it.

5172.verse: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion, although those who associate others with Allah dislike it.

5173.verse: O you who have believed, shall I guide you to a transaction that will save you from a painful punishment?

5174.verse: [It is that] you believe in Allah and His Messenger and strive in the cause of Allah with your wealth and your lives. That is best for you, if you should know.

5175.verse: He will forgive for you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow and pleasant dwellings in gardens of perpetual residence. That is the great attainment.

5176.verse: And [you will obtain] another [favor] that you love - victory from Allah and an imminent conquest; and give good tidings to the believers.

5177.verse: O you who have believed, be supporters of Allah, as when Jesus, the son of Mary, said to the disciples, "Who are my supporters for Allah?" The disciples said, "We are supporters of Allah." And a faction of the Children of Israel believed and a faction disbelieved. So We supported those who believed against their enemy, and they became dominant.
